summary: Manolo, a young man who is torn between fulfilling the expectations of his family and following his heart, embarks on an adventure that spans three fantastic worlds where he must face his greatest fears.
cast: Diego Luna|Zoe Saldana|Channing Tatum|Ron Perlman|Christina Applegate|Ice Cube|Kate del Castillo|Hector Elizondo|Danny Trejo|Carlos Alazraqui|Ana de la Reguera|Emil-Bastien Bouffard|Elijah Rodriguez|Genesis Ochoa|Plácido Domingo|Jorge R. director: Director: Jorge R. Gutiérrez (as Jorge R. Gutierrez)
title: El libro de la vida
